S03n228:1: na vibhavakṣayāvekṣayā samṛddhyāśayā vā pradānavaidhuryamupayānti satpuruṣāḥ |
S03n228:3: bodhisattvabhūtaḥ kilāyaṃ bhagavāṃstyāgaśīlakulavinayaśrutajñānāvismayādiguṇasamudito dhanadāyamāno vibhavasaṃpadā sarvātithitvādanuparatadānasatro lokahitārthapravṛtto dāyakaśreṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhī babhūva mātsaryādidoṣāviṣahyo'viṣahya iti prakāśanāmā |
S03n228:5: yathārthināṃ darśanamāsa tasya tathārthināṃ darśanamāsa tasya ||1 ||
S03n228:6: dehīti yācñāniyatārthamukto nāstīti nāsau gadituṃ śaśāka |
S03n228:7: hṛtāvakāśā hi babhūva citte tasyārthasaktiḥ kṛpayā mahatyā ||2 ||
S03n228:10: bhavanti lokasya hi bhūyasārthā lobhāśrayād durgatimārgasārthāḥ |
S03n228:12: atha tasya mahāsattvasya yathābhilaṣitairakliṣṭaiḥ śiṣṭopacāravibhūṣaṇairvipulairarthavisargairyācanakajanaṃ samantataḥ saṃtarpayataḥ pradānaudāryaśravaṇādvismayāvarjitamanāḥ śakro devendraḥ pradānasthiraniścayamasya jijñāsamānaḥ pratyahaṃ dhanadhānyaratnaparicchadajātaṃ tattadantardhāpayāmāsa |
S03n228:15: yathā yathā tasya vineśurarthāḥ sūryābhisṛṣṭa iva toyaleśāḥ |
S03n228:17: atha śakro devendrastyāgaparāyaṇameva taṃ mahāsattvamavetya prakṣīyamāṇavibhavasāramapi vismitataramatistasyaikarātreṇa sarvaṃ vibhavasāramantardhāpayāmāsānyatra rajjukuṇḍalāddātrāccaikasmāt |
S03n228:18: atha bodhisattvaḥ prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ yathocittaṃ prativibuddhaḥ paśyati sma dhanadhānyaparicchadaparijanavibhavaśūnyaṃ niṣkūjadīnaṃ svabhavanaṃ rākṣasairivodvāsitamanabhirāmadarśanīyaṃ,
S03n228:19: kimiti ca samutthitavitarkaḥ samanuvicaraṃstadrajjukuṇḍalakaṃ dātraṃ ca kevalamatra dadarśa |
S03n228:20: tasya cintā prādurabhavat-yadi tāvat kenacidyācitumanucitavacasā svavikramopārjitopajauvinā madgṛhe praṇaya evaṃ darśitaḥ sūpayuktā evamarthāḥ |
S03n228:21: atha tvidānīṃ madbhāgyadoṣāducchrayamasahamānena kenacidanupayuktā eva vidrutāstatkaṣṭam |
S03n228:23: arthināmeva pīḍā tu dahatyatra mano mama ||6 ||
S03n228:28: atha sa bodhisattvaḥ svadhairyāvaṣṭambhādanāsvāditaviṣādadainyastasyāmapyavasthāyāmanabhyastayācñākramatvāt parān yācituṃ paricitānapi na prasehe |
S03n228:29: evaṃ duṣkaraṃ yācitumiti ca tasya bhūyasī yācanakeṣvanukampā babhūva |
S03n228:30: atha sa mahātmā yācanakajanasvāgatādikriyāvekṣayā svayameva tadrajjukuṇḍalakaṃ dātraṃ ca pratigṛhya pratyahaṃ tṛṇavikrayopalabdhayā vibhavamātrayārthijanapraṇayasammānanāṃ cakāra |
S03n228:31: atha śakro devendrastasyemāmaviṣāditāṃ parame'pi dāridrye pradānābhimukhatāṃ cāvekṣya savismayabahumānaḥ saṃdṛśyamānadivyādbhutavapurantarikṣe sthitvā dānādvicchandayaṃstaṃ mahāsattvamuvāca-gṛhapate !
S03n228:33: na dasyubhirnaiva jalānalābhyāṃ na rājabhiḥ saṃhriyamāṇavittaḥ ||8 ||
S03n228:34: tattvāṃ hitāvekṣitayā bravīmi niyaccha dāne vyasanānurāgam |
S03n228:35: itthaṃgataḥ sannapi cenna dadyā yāyāḥ punaḥ pūrvasamṛddhiśobhām ||9 ||
S03n228:36: śaśvat kṛśenāpi parivyayeṇa kālena dṛṣṭvā kṣayamarjanānām |
S03n228:37: cayena valmīkasamucchrayāṃśca vṛddhyarthinaḥ saṃyama eva panthāḥ ||10 ||
S03n228:40: mā caiva tadbhūnmama śakra vittaṃ yatprāptihetoḥ kṛpaṇāśayaḥ syām ||11 ||
S03n228:41: icchanti yācñāmaraṇena gantuṃ duḥkhasya yasya pratikāramārgam |
S03n228:43: tanmadvidhaḥ kiṃ svidupādadīta ratnaṃ dhanaṃ vā divi vāpi rājyam |
S03n228:48: dāne nidāne ca sukhodayānāṃ mātsaryamāryaḥ ka ivāśrayeta ||15 ||
S03n228:50: svabhyastaharṣaṃ tu manaḥ pradānaistadutpathe kena dhṛtiṃ labheta ||16 ||
S03n228:51: na cātra manyoranuvṛttimārge cittaṃ bhavānarhati saṃniyoktum |
S03n228:52: na hi svabhāvasya vipakṣadurgamāroḍhumalpena balena śakyam ||17 ||
S03n228:53: śakra uvāca-gṛhapate ! paryāptavibhavasya paripūrṇakośakoṣṭhāgārasya samyakpravṛttavividhavipulakarmāntasya virūḍhāyaterloke vaśīkṛtaiśvaryasyāyaṃ kramo nemāṃ daśāmabhiprapannasya | paśya-
S03n228:56: jane prasaṅgena vitasya sadgatiṃ prabodhya harṣaṃ sasuhṛtsu bandhuṣu |
S03n228:58: atha pradāne pravijṛmbhitakramaḥ sukheṣu vā naiti janasya vācyatām |
S03n228:61: anāryatāpyatra ca nāma kā bhavenna yatpradadyā vibhaveṣvabhāviṣu ||21 ||
S03n228:65: naiti prītiṃ tāṃ hi mahatyāpi vibhūtyā
S03n228:86: ityukte śakro devendraḥ samabhiprasāditamanāḥ sādhu sādhvityenamabhisaṃrādhya sabahumānasnigdhamavekṣamāṇa uvāca-
S03n228:89: acintayitvā tu dhanakṣayaṃ tvayā svasaukhyahāniṃ mama ca pratāraṇām |
S03n228:92: pradānasaṃkocavirūpatāṃ gataṃ dhane pranaṣṭe'pi na yattadāśayā ||30 ||
S03n228:94: himāvadātaḥ śikharīva vāyunā na yatpradānādasi kampito mayā ||31 ||
S03n228:95: yaśaḥ samudbhāvayituṃ parīkṣayā dhanaṃ tavedaṃ tu nigūḍhavānaham |
S03n228:97: yataḥ pradānairabhivarṣa yācakān hradān mahāmegha ivābhipūrayan |
S03n228:98: dhanakṣayaṃ nāpsyasi matparigrahādidaṃ kṣamethāśca viceṣṭitaṃ mama ||33 ||
S03n228:99: ityenamabhisaṃrādhya śakrastaccāsya vibhavasāramupasaṃhṛtya kṣamayitvā ca tatraivāntardadhe |
S03n228:100: tadevaṃ na vibhavakṣayāvekṣayā samṛddhyāśayā vā pradānavaidhuryamupayānti satpuruṣā iti |
